info_zh: 當雙持武器時,切換你的主武器跟副武.需要兩回合施展.

info: Swiftly attack twice, then swap your primary weapon and off-hand. Requires 2 turns in battle.
info_zh: 連續攻擊兩次之後切換你的主武器跟副武.需要兩回合施展.

info: Swiftly attack thrice, then swap your primary and off-hand. Requires 2 turns in battle.

info_zh: 你在不配戴盾牌的狀況下能純熟的戰鬥。當雙手都持武器時，能造成額外的傷害。

info: You always know where to go. You have increased view distance.
info_zh: 你總知道該往哪走。你的可視範圍增加。

info: When wielding two staves, spells that require multiple turns to cast may require 1 less.
info_zh: 裝備兩個法杖時,需要複數回合詠唱的法術有機會減少一回合.

info: Any follower has the chance to protect you in battle.
info_zh: 你的跟隨者在戰鬥中有機會替你擋下攻擊。

info: Your attacks deal extra damage to opponent Ward and may decrease their defenses.
info_zh: 你的攻擊對對手的護盾造成額外的傷害，並降低他們的防禦力。

info: Deal magic damage with the might of beasts and acquire Ward for 1 turn. Total damage is determined by both your attack and magic stats.
info_zh: 造成大量龍屬性物理傷害，傷害量同時計入物攻及魔攻，並啟動護盾一回合。

info: Aligns you to the element of Earth. You will be immune to earth, weak to fire and deal 50% increased earthen damage. Permanent until overwritten by other alignments.
Aligns you to the element of Lightning . You will be immune to lightning, weak to earth and deal 50% increased lightning damage. Permanent until overwritten by other alignments.
Aligns you to the element of Fire. You will be immune to fire, weak to water and deal 50% increased fire damage. Permanent until overwritten by other alignments.
Aligns you to the element of Water . You will be immune to water, weak to lightning and deal 50% increased water damage. Permanent until overwritten by other alignments.
